name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Midas | Shop online using mobile money

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the Midas extension, African users can purchase items and shop online with mobile money

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortless Online Shopping with Mobile Money

Midas makes it possible to shop online globally using your mobile money accounts (MTN, Vodafone, Airtel, Orange, Safaricom, etc).

✓Seamlessly make payments at Amazon, Netflix, Shein, AliExpress, etc, using mobile money.
✓Use mobile money for more than just sending and receiving cash, with Midas unlock global shopping and spending.
✓No hidden fees—pay only a simple 2.5% per purchase.
✓Secure, fast, and hassle-free shopping experience without the need for credit or debit cards.

Try it out now.
